query:
SELECT 
  DATE(createdAt) as data,
  COUNT(*) as total_associacoes,
  COUNT(DISTINCT clienteId) as clientes_distintos,
  COUNT(DISTINCT mercadoId) as mercados_distintos
FROM clientes_mercados
GROUP BY DATE(createdAt)
ORDER BY data;

SELECT 
  DATE(createdAt) as data,
  COUNT(*) as total_associacoes,
  COUNT(DISTINCT clienteId) as clientes_distintos,
  COUNT(DISTINCT mercadoId) as mercados_distintos
FROM clientes_mercados
GROUP BY DATE(createdAt)
ORDER BY data;
